incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. Start time : 07/10/2025 06:00 UTC End time : 07/10/2025 15:00 UTC Service impact : The cooling system's efficiency could be temporarily impacted for some servers, which could cause a decreased performance during this maintenance.
